description: runtime: use ROUND macro for rounding

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://dvyukov%40google.com@code.google.com/p/go/

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=20c30938cfd2 ***

runtime: use ROUND macro for rounding

R=golang-dev, minux.ma
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10256043

Sorry guys, this has broken quite a few of the 32bit builders,
although it passes on my linux/386 host.

On Thu, Jun 13, 2013 at 10:03 PM,  <dvyukov@google.com> wrote:
> *** Submitted as
> https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=20c30938cfd2 ***
>

>

> CC=golang-dev
> https://codereview.appspot.com/10256043

> "golang-dev" group.

> email to golang-dev+unsubscribe@googlegroups.com.
> For more options, visit https://groups.google.com/groups/opt_out.

>

C operator precedence, damn you!
